dialogs.text: You're local?I've heard things. I need you to slip into the camp and find something for me.
I can't skulk around the barracks, but you? You've got the chops.
Do it, and I'll slide you some intel?enough to get the lay of the land.

stage2_1.text: Perfect. I'll be right here waiting on your good news.
I've greased the wheels in the camp?keep it clean and they won't hassle you. Still, search quietly. Don't draw eyes.
You need to find me a Signal_Amplifier.

stage2_2.text: Shame. Looks like this intel stays with me, then.

stage3.text: Good work, friend. You're a solid operator—if you were in my unit, you'd be a real asset.
Two pieces of intelligence. Should be exactly what you need.
